overview.en: UNI-V2 token represents a share in the Uniswap LON/ETH Pool. Liquidity providers earn 0.3% fee on every trade made through the protocol. The fees are then split proportionally to your share of the pool. Own share of the pool, you become a liquidity provider of the Uniswap LON/ETH Pool.
overview.zh: UNI-V2 代币代表 Uniswap LON/ETH 池中的份额,流动性提供者通过该协议进行的每笔交易赚取0.3% 的费用,然后根据您在池中的份额按比例分配费用;拥有该池的份额，您就是 Uniswap LON/ETH 池的流动性提供者。
